Sequence Information.Peptide Name: B1CTcu3 (brevinin; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretions, the Indian bicoloured frog,Clinotarsus curtipes, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 95.7% similar toB1CTcu2, which contains one additional F at the N-terminus. Active against S. aureus MTCC 9542, B. subtilis  MTCC 14416 (MIC 6.25-12.5 ug/ml), B. coagulans ATCC 7050 (6.25 ug/ml), VRE ATCC 29212 (anti-VRE), MRSA ATCC 43300 (MIC 50-100 ug/ml), Gram- E. coli MG1655 (6.25 ug/ml), and V. cholerae (12.5 ug/ml). Hemolytic 45%.
Literature Information.Author: Abraham P, George S, Kumar KS. 2014
Literature Information.Title: Novel antibacterial peptides from the skin secretion of the Indian bicoloured frog Clinotarsus curtipes.
